bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: The remmina telepathy plugin contains an undefined reference to a nonexistant remmina_tp_handler_new.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): remmina-1.2.0-0.23.20160914git42f5a87.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: 100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1. run remmina 2. check stderr
Actual results: The telepathy plugin is not loaded, and the following is printed to stderr:
Failed to load plugin: /usr/lib64/remmina/plugins/remmina-plugin-telepathy.so. Error: /usr/lib64/remmina/plugins/remmina-plugin-telepathy.so: undefined symbol: remmina_tp_handler_new
Expected results: Either plugin should load, or not be built.
Additional info: This issue dates back to at least 1.0.0. As this function does not exist, and without which the plugin does nothing, I suggest disabling the plugin entirely until this is fixed upstream.

FreeRDP had no releases for more than 2 years and there is absolutely no guarantee of any stability towards API/ABI. So the best that it can happen is that in a given moment in time all components relying on FreeRDP work fine. Just by saying that it makes me shiver.
Would it be possible for you to make a test with the package that is available for Fedora 26 and see if the issue is fixed there? That's another snapshot for both components (FreeRDP/Remmina). Maybe I can push the same build to Fedora 25 along with the other dependent components.
I can build those for you in Koji for Fedora 25 if you can't on your own.

This isn't related to FreeRDP in any way; that's used by Remmina only in the RDP plugin, but I'm discussing the Telepathy plugin. remmina-plugins/telepathy hasn't been touched in 2.5 years[1], so a new snapshot isn't going to change anything. The plugin is simply not functional, and therefore should be disabled until such time that it is.
[1] https://github.com/FreeRDP/Remmina/commits/next/remmina-plugins/telepathy

freerdp-2.0.0-23.20170302git210de68.fc25 freerdp1.2-1.2.0-6.fc25 guacamole-server-0.9.11-3.fc25 remmina-1.2.0-0.32.20170302git1da1fb6.fc25 vinagre-3.22.0-4.fc25 weston-1.12.0-6.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-7191d8e808

freerdp-2.0.0-23.20170302git210de68.fc25, freerdp1.2-1.2.0-6.fc25, guacamole-server-0.9.11-3.fc25, remmina-1.2.0-0.32.20170302git1da1fb6.fc25, vinagre-3.22.0-4.fc25, weston-1.12.0-6.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
